name: Google Fix Search Bar
description:
Tested on:
Mozilla Firefox 24.0 / Windows Seven (1280x1024)
After install this addon your search bar will be fixed.
additional_info: Required: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/9310 UPDATE GoogleMonkeyR 6 MARCH 2014 http://userscripts.org/topics/212234 NEW UPDATE GoogleMonkeyR 31 AUG 2014 https://db.tt/zcLYfvZo AFTER INSTALL GO TO STYLISH AND EDIT THIS SCRIPT: #-----[ FIND ]------------------------------------------ @-moz-document domain("google.com") #-----[ REPLACE WITH ]-------------------------------- @-moz-document regexp("https?://(www|news|play|host-b)\\.google(\\.com?)?(\\.[a-z][a-z])?/(|webhp|search|news|play|ig|service-a).*") @update 27 February 2015 bug fixed: change id #gb to #searchform @update 11 April 2014 bug fixed: restored logo google logo and glass image in search button bug fixed: restored old font size in search results @update 5 October 2013 bug fixed: hide other info clouds bug fixed: hide cookies info bug fixed: search options is now clickable @update 2 October 2013 bug fixed: optymalzed domains code bug fixed: global optymalzed code bug fixed: hide opinion button in profile bug fixed: hide hr in profile bug fixed: hide Google Chrome Cloud bug fixed: change margins, paddings and many many more in Google Calendar, Google Play, Account Setting @update 3 August 2013 bug fixed: optymalzed domains code from 160 lines to only two line bug fixed: edited shadow-box, now it is more delicate(original) bug fixed: margins in Google Docs bug fixed: account setting now looks better bug fixed: redundant code Add Google Fix Search Bar in: Google Play and Google News Remove Google Fix Search Bar from: Google Reader, Google Plus, Gmail.com, Picasa
